trace.description: If true, log rippled requests and responses to stdout.

feeCushion.description: Factor to multiply estimated fee by to provide a cushion in case the required fee rises during submission of a transaction. Defaults to `1.2`.

server.description: URI for rippled websocket port to connect to. Must start with `wss://` or `ws://`.

proxy.description: URI for HTTP/HTTPS proxy to use to connect to the rippled server.

timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds before considering a request to have failed.

proxyAuthorization.description: Username and password for HTTP basic authentication to the proxy in the format **username:password**.

authorization.description: Username and password for HTTP basic authentication to the rippled server in the format **username:password**.

trustedCertificates.description: Array of PEM-formatted SSL certificates to trust when connecting to a proxy. This is useful if you want to use a self-signed certificate on the proxy server. Note: Each element must contain a single certificate; concatenated certificates are not valid.

items.description: A PEM-formatted SSL certificate to trust when connecting to a proxy.

key.description: A string containing the private key of the client in PEM format. (Can be an array of keys).

passphrase.description: The passphrase for the private key of the client.

certificate.description: A string containing the certificate key of the client in PEM format. (Can be an array of certificates).
